title: Interpretation of a dream about burning the neck and chest in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about burning the neck and chest in a dream. There are many interpretations and indicators that have been developed to interpret the dream of burning the neck and chest in a dream, so we present through the lines all of these and many more. Interpretation of a dream about burning the neck and chest in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about burning the neck and chest in a dream. Perhaps seeing a burning chest is a sign of inappropriate emotional relationships, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her chest burned in a dream, this may be evidence of delaying marriage, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When You see a burning throat that may indicate bad friends and you should stay away from them, and God knows best. It can also express the dreamer’s warning to stay away from bad deeds, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of burning a leg in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of burning a leg in a dream. Some scholars reported that seeing a burning leg could indicate success, and God knows best. While Some scholars have mentioned that the interpretation of a dream about burning a leg in a dream could be an indication of trouble, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Also, seeing a burned leg can indicate committing sins, and God knows the unseen. When you see feet burning, this may indicate the difficulties you are facing, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about burning. Noon in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about burning the back in a dream could be a sign of sin and he must repent, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his back burning in a dream, this may be a sign of sins and he must return, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees her back burning in a dream, that is It indicates trouble, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his back being burned, this may lead to miserliness and distraction. Interpretation of a dream of burning a hand with hot water in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of burning his hand with hot water in a dream could lead to recklessness on the part of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. As it may be a sign of indifference and lack of respect for the value of things. And God knows best. Interpretation scholars also reported that seeing a hand being burned with hot water may lead to earning money by illegal means, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees his hand being burned with hot water in a dream, this may indicate suspicious money, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about burning a hand with iron. In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about burning a hand with an iron in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself burning his hand with an iron in a dream, this may lead to unpleasant things, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees herself burning her hand with an iron in a dream, it may This indicates mistreatment of some people, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees herself burning her hand with an iron in a dream, this may lead to anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing blue fire in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing blue fire in a dream may indicate the presence of A woman with a cold heart, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees a blue fire in a dream, it could express a cold woman, and God knows best. Whereas if the dreamer sees a blue fire in a dream, this may indicate magic, and God knows the unseen.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream?

preview.html: We will deal with Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream, as the snake is considered a harmful reptile and many of its species are poisonous and sometimes deadly, and seeing it in a dream does not necessarily mean a bad interpretation. It can be interpreted, and in this topic on the encyclopedia website, we will provide many interpretations of the dream of a snake in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream. The snake in a dream has many meanings. It could be an enemy, an unjust ruler, or a state. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a snake Big in a dream means that he is an enemy waiting for God to destroy him. If the dreamer sees a big snake and is not afraid of it, he will gain power, which could be a high position or what he does not get. If the dreamer sees that he is getting a big snake, it means that he will get a lot of money From his enemy without a fight between them. When the dreamer sees that a large snake has bitten him, this means that something bad will happen to him or that the enemy will be able to do it, and God knows best. And if a pregnant woman sees a large snake, she may have a male child and he may have a good relationship in the future, But if she is not pregnant, she will carry a male child in the next few days. Seeing many snakes killed in one place means that there will be a war in that place where the enemies will be defeated. Killing a snake is beneficial for the dreamer. If a single person sees that he has killed a snake, this indicates that he will get married in reality. If a divorced woman sees that she is trying to get rid of a large snake and kill it, then this dream shows that she will emerge from a crisis that is going on. Dream Interpretation: A snake bite in a dream. Seeing a snake in a dream biting the dreamer is considered an undesirable matter and means That the enemy will be able to overcome and defeat him in reality. But if the dreamer sees that the snake bites him and kills him itself, this means that he will prevail over his enemy after a battle between them. If a girl dreams that a snake is trying to bite her and kill him, this is a sign that she is a good girl with good character and loyal to her religion. When a girl sees in her dream that a snake is biting her in the lower leg, she will commit adultery with the one who was forced to do that to her against her will. As for a married woman who sees a snake biting her neck in her dream, this means that there will be a major dispute between her and her husband. And the snake bit his leg. In a dream, it means disturbance or malicious trickery from one of the people surrounding the dreamer. A snake that bites a pregnant woman in a dream means that she will face a difficult birth. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in a dream. Many interpreters agreed that seeing a black snake in a dream means an enemy, disputes, intrigues, and misfortunes that befall the dreamer. A girl seeing a black snake in a dream is evidence that her family environment has great differences and that she is surrounded by an atmosphere of negative feelings and thoughts. A dream about a black snake indicates an evil woman who seeks to gossip and ruin the dreamer’s life. If a married woman sees in her dream a black snake trying to bite her, this means that there is a woman In her life, she creates discord and arranges strife between her and her husband. The attack of the black snake

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing ants in a dream

preview.html: Ants in a dream: Ants are considered one of the annoying insects for humans because an ant bite can cause a person allergies and pain for a period of time. In this topic, we will talk about the interpretation of ants in a dream and what they bring to a person, whether good or bad. Seeing ants in a dream What is the interpretation of ants in a dream? The interpretation varies according to the dreamer’s condition. If ants appear in a dream on a person’s bed, this is evidence of an increase in the number of his children and their large number. Whoever sees that ants are flying in a place and there is a sick person in that place, this indicates the death of that person, and God knows best. Seeing ants entering a city or country indicates that soldiers will enter that place. The country in reality. Seeing ants can indicate food, because ants do not live in a place without food, as they are always looking for a living. If a person is really sick and sees ants in a dream walking in his body, this portends his imminent death, and God knows best. What is the interpretation? Ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that biting an ant in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be harmed by someone close to him. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream means that her marriage is imminent. Ibn Sirin explains that if a person sees ants in his dream, and these ants In small numbers, this is evidence that this dreamer’s children will be fair. In fact, the number of a person’s children could be the same as the number of ants that appeared to him in a dream. If one sees three ants, it means that he will have three children. Seeing him with clothes shows a person’s elegance and interest in his clothes. Ants in a dream may indicate that a person will be cured of diseases if he suffers from them. While being bitten by ants in a dream is for someone who has entered into a business A new one shows his success in that trade, his wealth, and the money he will obtain from it. Enter the Egyptian dream interpretation website from Google, and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. What is the interpretation of ants in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq? Imam al-Sadiq confirms that the large number of ants inside the house in a dream in a disturbing manner confirms the presence of problems. Inside that house. The imam says that ants in a dream are among the things that confirm the large number of children. The appearance of ants in the dreamer indicates that his money will increase soon because he will obtain an inheritance or great wealth. Ants in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpreters promise that seeing ants in a dream for an unmarried woman It is one of the good visions for her, which brings her kindness and blessings. If a girl sees that there are ants walking on the bed, this indicates that marriage is approaching for her, and that someone is proposing to her. The abundance of ants in a girl’s dream indicates an abundance of nutrition, which varies according to the type. It may be success in studies, a good husband, or good children in the future. If a girl is bitten by an ant in her dream, this means that her husband will be generous and she will feel happy and satisfied with him. Seeing ants in a girl’s clothes confirms that she has a beautiful and elegant appearance, while ants in her hair confirms The presence of problems that God will solve with His power. Ants in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees ants in her dream and has not given birth before, this foretells a

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad: Traveling abroad is considered a dream for all people, but the interpretation of a dream about traveling differs depending on the means of transportation used for transportation. We will present to you the interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad according to the means of transportation used, and we will discover whether this dream is evidence of the nutrition, benefit, or harm that a person can expect through a website. Different electronic.Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroadInterpretation of a dream about traveling abroadIbn Sirin believes that the vision of traveling abroad is an expression of a person’s desire to achieve some dreams and aspirations, and a person’s dream of changing the reality around him, because of his desire to move from one place to another.And if one often sees that he is traveling to Outside, this is evidence of many dreams of a person that he wants to achieve. As for the means of transportation used for travel, it indicates the type of a person’s dream. Ibn Sirin believes that without problems on his way, if a person travels from one place to another, this indicates that he will achieve Dreaming of ease. It indicates stability of one's circumstances, one's religion will be reformed, and one's closeness to God if one travels on foot without using any means of transportation. If one sees that he is traveling barefoot, this is evidence that all his problems will soon be solved and that his relationship with God will be strengthened. It may indicate that he lost a large part of his money, but if he sees himself lost in travel, then this is true. Evidence that this person has a certain will and needs to implement it if he dreams that he is traveling to another place and finds some markets on his way. Ibn Sirin believes It may be evidence that a person should follow God’s teachings and avoid the prohibitions of traveling abroad. Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad according to Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad. As for Al-Nabulsi, he believes that traveling abroad in a dream is a person’s ambition to meet new people and get close to them and their different ideas, customs and circumstances. It is interpreted Traveling abroad in a dream is also a transformation in a person’s life and indicates that his needs may end and he will repent to God if the person returns from the dream trip. However, if a person falls ill and sees in a dream that he is traveling abroad, this may indicate his closeness, and God knows best. Interpretation Ibn Shaheen’s dream of traveling abroad Ibn Shaheen claims that traveling abroad can indicate two different things. Ibn Shaheen says that it indicates that many of his problems will be solved and will end soon if one sees in his dream that he is traveling abroad and is happy. However, if one sees that he is traveling abroad But he feels sad, as this may indicate that his circumstances will change for the worse and that this is a sign from God. Ibn Shaheen confirms that if a person carries water and food with him on his travels in a dream, this is one of the happy dreams that bring goodness. It indicates the person’s closeness to God, and his condition will improve. And his anxiety goes away if he sees himself traveling towards the Qiblah. See also: Why is the Dead Sea called the Dead Sea? Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad for unmarried womenInterpretation of a dream about traveling abroad If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is traveling abroad, this bodes well for her.

title: What is the interpretation of imprisonment in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Sirin on different occasions?

preview.html: The interpretation of prison in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq and the most famous interpretation scholars, you will find in this article on the encyclopedia website, where prison is considered one of the most desolate and frightening places for many, and it has various concepts, so that you find the oppressor and the oppressed in it, and the interpretation of dreams varies according to the nature of the dreamer, gender, psychological, material and social situation and their relationship. With those around him, the interpretation of a dream for an unmarried woman differs from its interpretation for a married woman or a man, but all these opinions are personal judgments of scholars only, and all destinies are in the hands of God and He alone knows the unseen, and the prison can appear in a dream as a secluded and dark place, or In the form of high walls, or any other signs that indicate distress and suffocation. Interpretation of prison in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream varies depending on the condition of the dreamer, his social, psychological and economic status, and his relationship with those around him. Sometimes, the prison symbolizes a situation Positive and abundant sustenance that fills the dreamer’s life and can indicate injustice, corruption, and anxiety, depending on the dreamer’s psychological state. Chains and chains in dreams indicate worries, debts, and great sadness. If these restrictions are severe, this means that the dreamer is going through major psychological and material crises and is difficult for him to overcome. Easily. If the dreamer is able to escape from prison and remove the shackles from his hand, this means that he will be able to overcome crises, God willing, and will be able to take advantage of the opportunities available to him. Psychological fears and problems can be interpreted by the subconscious in a dream in the form of a prison or prison. If the dreamer is in debt and has a lot of material worries, and he sees in a dream that he is breaking the shackles and shackles from his hand, this means that he will be able to overcome these crises. Interpretation of imprisonment in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin sees that imprisonment in a dream often reflects the crises and problems that he is going through The dreamer in real life. If the dreamer is able to get out of prison and free himself from restrictions, this means that he is able to manage his affairs wisely and conscientiously, and it means that, God willing, he will find solutions to his problems in the near future. If the dreamer in a dream enjoys great freedom after captivity and imprisonment This means that he will recover soon, God willing, if he is suffering from a disease, or one of his relatives will be cured if he is suffering from a disease. Freedom after captivity in a dream symbolizes comfort and goodness after hardships, difficulties and problems. The feeling of injustice and oppression symbolizes that there are many conspiracies and negative thoughts surrounding the dreamer from those close to him and he must be careful and not trust everyone, because problems may come to him from where he does not know. If the dreamer enters prison and cannot escape and the prison continues to imprison him, this indicates his many mistakes and his need to repent and return to God and not oppress any soul. If the prison door is open and the dreamer can escape at any time, this means that great positive changes will occur in his life And he must

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing sand in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: There is a lot of Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of sand in a dream, which indicates kindness and great saving, and it can also indicate saving on a large scale and can be interpreted for young people as travel for some business and the dream of sand is different from human for a young man for a woman or married or divorced or remarried, we will explain today According to Ibn Sirin, seeing sand in a dream and its meaning, as well as seeing a dream of sitting on sand, seeing yourself sitting on sand in a dream and seeing sand in a dream as a girl, be with us to meet them together. Interpretation of a dream about sand by Ibn Sirin Seeing yourself walking on soft sand in a dream is evidence that the owner of the vision He is a person who observes religious matters and performs his household duties. If you see someone in a dream that he is collecting sand, this indicates a lot of livelihood that you will gain. Seeing a large amount of sand in a dream is a sign of fraud and deception. If the dreamer sees that he is walking on white sand, This indicates a lot of money. Seeing yourself sitting on the sand in a dream is an indication of getting rid of fears and problems. Dream of sea sand: Sea sand in a dream shows a single girl many positive signs, including a feeling of security and stability, and she will receive reassurance that she has missed it for a long time. The jurists pointed out Until the dreamer who sees beach sand in his dream is evidence that his life faced some problems that caused him sadness, but these problems will disappear and fears will disappear soon. Ibn Sirin said: Sea or beach sand means that the dreamer is wasting his time without benefiting from it. It appears. The dreamer sleeping on the sea sand indicates a lack of emotion and feeling of love towards the opposite sex. Seeing sand in a dream. Collecting sand in a dream. If the dreamer is willing to collect sand in his dream, this indicates his extreme thinking about how to really save his money and not spend it on anything trivial. If the dreamer’s life portends failure as a result of problems interfering in it and not controlling it, and he sees That he was collecting sand in the dream, this is evidence of the purity and stability of his life. And stability. Security soon. Imam Al-Usaimi said that whoever collects sand in a dream is evidence of his great ability to collect and keep money. Interpretation of a dream about sand for a single woman: If a girl sees that she is sitting on the sand of the beach in front of the sea, this indicates the comfort, calm, and happiness that she feels. If she sees in Dreaming that she is sitting on soft sand, this is evidence that she will get married soon. If she finds in the dream that she is sitting on wet sand, this is evidence of the kindness and goodness that she is looking for. A dream of sand for an unmarried woman is evidence of the complete elimination of problems and crises that she is going through. And the science of sleep On soft sand is evidence of marriage near the right person. Interpretation of a dream about sand for a married woman. If a married woman sees sand in a dream and makes a mistake, this is a sign that she is going through some problems and difficulties in her life. If you see a married woman walking on sand, this indicates many fears that you have. Seeing A married woman takes wet sand from her husband, this is p

title: Interpretation of the dream of defecation in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen.

preview.html: Interpretation of urinating in a dream: Many of us dream that he is comforting himself during sleep and wakes up quickly for fear of going beyond it without controlling himself, so we find that this vision indicates many clarifications that we will understand in the interpreter through his interpretation of the dream of defecation. In a dream, so please continue. Interpretation of a dream about defecating in a dream: Seeing defecation in a dream has important connotations, which are: great comfort in the dreamer’s life, as he feels stable with his family, and does not find himself facing a problem or crisis. If he does it in front of everyone and does not care about them, this indicates That he achieved his goals without anyone standing in front of him. When the dreamer sees that he is doing this without realizing it, this indicates his desperate need for money and his lack of interest in the means that will help him overcome his crises. If he does this in his bed in a dream, this means that he is sick and will not recover in the future. A short time, but he will stay in bed for a long time. When the dreamer sees that he is looking for a hidden place to relieve himself, this is evidence that he spends a lot of money only on his desires, without paying attention to the amount of money he spends. If the dreamer sees that he is getting rid of a person, this indicates On his enmity to this person and not accepting him in his life. If this defecation was for children, then this vision is evidence of a great blessing for the dreamer and endless goodness. Peeling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Our greatest imam, Ibn Sirin, explained to us the meaning of this vision, which is: This dream is an expression of solving the dreamer’s problems that It causes him sadness in his life. The vision expresses a tremendous reward that will come to him. Perhaps the vision is a depiction of the dreamer performing many good deeds, such as zakat. If he sees that he took a long time to comfort himself in the dream, this confirms his delay in completing his journey, and this is because he is exposed There are many obstacles in his way. When you see him hiding what he needs when he spends it so that others do not see it, this indicates that he is hiding some money that no one close to him knows about. When the dreamer sees that he did this to himself in his dream, this indicates that he has many sins. He must repent for it immediately. But if he sees that he has been freed from his need while he is on his bed, then this is an evil sign for him, as it turns out that he divorced his wife. If he did that in a place far from his home and that place was dirty, then this is a clear indication that he will recover from He will fall ill soon. But if he is in front of a group of people and some of them see him, this indicates that he will be exposed to a scandal that will greatly affect him, or it may indicate that he has suffered from negligence in his work. If he carries it after he has relieved himself, this confirms that he is resorting to forbidden things to earn his money, and this The dream makes him continue what he is doing, to stay away from these wrong actions. The vision is an expression of this dreamer who is suffering from an illness and it can also be a warning to him about his approaching death if he feels very tired in his reality. Rejection in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about defecation for a single woman explains many things. Important concepts, namely: This dream is a happy sign that she will soon hear good news, as tremendous goodness is approaching her that will change her life dramatically.

title: Interpretation of seeing lice in my daughter’s hair and killing her

preview.html: And to get all the good things in her life, and to see the good things in her life, and it will make her happy for a long time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is looking at lice, and she has a lot of hair In the dream, and she succeeded in killing him in the dream. It explains that she will face many things in her life, and she will make a wrong decision now, and she will regret it a lot. An unmarried girl saw in the dream that she saw lice walking in her hair in the dream, and she was pleased to see it in the dream. This is an indication of That he will succeed in his life, and he will see an abundance of goodness and food that he will live with. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is killing a lot of lice in her hair in a dream and rejoices. It indicates that she will make a wrong decision in her marriage and will be associated with a disabled person in her life, and God knows best. And seeing a girl In a dream, she was looking at lice walking in her hair in a dream, and she did not care about their presence. Here she explains that she will look at good things, and live in them this season of her life, God willing, for a long time. See also: Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing lice in hair In a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that there are a lot of lice in her hair, and she is happy that there are a lot of lice in the dream. This is an indication of her success in getting rid of the things in which she lives, and it passes and enters this period of her life. Likewise, a woman A married woman dreams that there are lice in her husband’s hair and she is trying to keep them away from him in the dream. It indicates that she will live with her husband in a time full of goodness, money and food, but she will face problems with him. And a married woman seeing in a dream that there are lice in her children’s hair, and she was combing their hair happily. It explains This married woman will raise her children well in their lives and will succeed. A married woman dreams of lice walking in her hair in a dream and trying to keep them. The meaning indicates the abundance of goodness and livelihood that she will see, and she will try to preserve them in her life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair in a dream For the divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees in a dream that there are a lot of lice in her hair and it looks very ugly in the dream. This is evidence that there are bad things that she is trying to get rid of and that God Almighty will find a way out of them. And the divorced woman who sees in a dream that there are lice in her ex-husband’s hair in the dream, And it seemed beautiful to him. This indicates that he will have a lot of money and kindness, and that he will offer her again in her life at this time. And if the divorced woman is looking for lice in a dream, to put it in her hair, then she feels very happy. It indicates that she is in this The time is when she tries to find a good husband and begins searching for him among those close to her, and God knows best. Either a divorced woman sees in a dream that he is looking at lice in his hair, and is happy to see him, and his appearance is beautiful. This indicates the beautiful life that she will live in this period of time, God willing. God is the Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation

title: I dreamed that I went to class

preview.html: I dreamed that I had my menstrual cycle in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. The cycle is a natural hormonal change that occurs in women every 28 days, and these changes begin at puberty, which is the age period from 8 to 15 years. It ends with menopause, which usually occurs between 45 and 55 years of age. Today, through this article, we will present to you I dreamed that I went to class. For great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that My period in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing menstrual blood in a dream. It indicates the beginning of a new life free of problems and worries. Menstrual blood in a woman’s dream indicates an abundance of goodness and blessings in her life. A woman who saw her menstrual bleeding becomes impure in a dream confirms that she will achieve great profits and gains from her work, and God knows best. Blood circulation in a dream indicates that we will hear happy news about the dreamer in the coming period. Seeing a woman’s menstrual blood and its color was black in a dream indicates many worries and anxieties in her life in the coming period. See another interpretation: A prayer for blood for menstruation is written. I dreamed that my menstrual cycle was in a dream. About single women: Seeing an unmarried woman during her menstruation in a dream indicates her distance from her Lord and the abundance of sins and disobedience in her life. Menstruation in one dream seems to mean that she will face some health problems in the near future, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman washing menstrual blood in a dream shows her repentance for what she did. Of sins and disobedience, and her repentance is sincere repentance. See another interpretation: I dreamed that my period was bleeding. I dreamed that my period was in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman bleeding in a dream indicates that promising things will happen to her and her family in the coming period, and God knows best. Menstrual blood in a married woman’s dream indicates God will bless her with a lot of goodness and sustenance in her life. Seeing a married woman completing her menstrual period in a dream says that she is neglecting herself and needs to take care of herself and take care of her. I dreamed that my period was in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman during her menstrual period in a dream indicates that she should take care of her health. She moves with caution so as not to harm her fetus. The flow of menstrual blood while a pregnant woman is sleeping indicates that she will go through an easy and effortless birth process without feeling any fatigue or pain. Seeing a pregnant woman bleeding black in a dream indicates the need for care and attention throughout the pregnancy so that her pregnancy period passes safely. See Another interpretation: When I was pregnant, I dreamed that I was pregnant and fell. I dreamed that my period was in a dream about a man. Seeing a man’s menstrual blood in a dream indicates that he will establish his own company and will achieve great success. Contaminated menstrual blood in a man’s dream indicates that he was very successful in his private professional life, and God knows best. Seeing a man’s vagina bleeding from his wife in a dream indicates that he is living a married life full of stability and happiness. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a vagina in a dream. We are happy to see the reception of your dream about “seeing menstrual blood.”
